goal.tools.mc.core

Interface State

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PropState
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GOALState, LTL2AUTState, ProductState

    public interface State
    Represents a state of an automaton as represented by Automaton. Implementations of this interface must define three "Jenkins" methods such that a State state can efficiently be hashed with Jenkins.apply(byte[], int, int).
    Author:
    sungshik

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int jenkinsB()
      Gets the seed for the second hash code as computed by Jenkins.apply(byte[], int, int).
      int jenkinsC()
      Gets the seed for the first hash code as computed by Jenkins.apply(byte[], int, int).
      byte[] jenkinsKey()
      Gets the key of the object for which the hash code need be computed by Jenkins.apply(byte[], int, int) as an array of bytes.
      java.lang.String toString(int offset)
      Returns the string representation of this state.

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString(int offset)
        Returns the string representation of this state.
        Parameters:
        offset - - The margin, i.e. number of white spaces, that the string must contain.
        Returns:
        The string.
